name: Smoothie Rush
description:
Sling smoothies to satisfy customers as quickly as you can. If the customers make it to the end of the bar, then it's game over! Don't break any glasses either, or your reign as smoothie king will come to an end. Can you survive the smoothie rush?

Features
• Easy to play
• Endless fun
• Collect tips to buy different smoothie servers
• Leaderboard

Instructions
• Swipe to serve a smoothie
• Tap and hold to run down a bar to collect tips or empty glasses
